name: Kao's Journey
description:
Kao's Journey follows Kao, a lonely bunny who finds himself mysteriously trapped on an island one day after stepping through a mysterious portal back on his homeland. This island is called Sunset Island, where the time of day is eternally set to sunset. However, as he travels through each location, he begins to discover that each world he lands in feels off and unnerving, as they get more and more ominous, platforms floating in the air.  Alone and nervous in the cyber universe known as GlitchVerse, Kao does his best to escape these unusual worlds and get back to his homeland safe and sound. Travel through 4 mysterious locations with level design that will put your high-speed platforming skills to the test! Battle quick enemies to earn Carrot Health Points and collect all of the Diamond Stones hidden in each level. It's up to you to lead Kao through this journey and get back home!

Be sure to read the notepad file! It gives you all you need to know about the controls, enemies, stages etc.

Some assets that were used from Sonic games: (I don't own Sonic, all rights belong to SEGA.)

Main Menu sounds: (Sonic Frontiers)

Sunset Island BG: (Sunset Hill - Sonic Advance 3)

Sunset Island Music: (Cyber Space 2-1: Slice & Sway - Sonic Frontiers)

Dessert Plains BG/music: (Dessert Ruins Zone 3 - Sonic Lost World

Funky Factory BG: (Death Egg - Sonic Forces)
Funky Factory music: (Pinball - Sonic Frontiers)

Rewind City music: (Sunset Heights - Sonic Forces)

Other sound effects provided by other sources (will add soon)

Tiles, background items, collectibles, Kao himself, buttons, menus and the enemies were all done by me!
